document_data.name: ''Hero's Chalice''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite card/Spellfire: Master the Magic/Forgotten Realms Chase|9/25}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''''hero's chalice''''' was a very rare [[enchanted]] [[tankard]] that produced defensive and strengthening magical effects.
document_data.Effects: The chalice's magics or the effects created by the liquid inside, granted the imbiber an immensely powerful magical protection and slightly boosted their attack power. The artifact could only be used by individuals of the heroic and selfless nature.
